breakdownSteps.name: Mash grains
breakdownSteps.description: Mash grains at 153° F (67° C) for 60 minutes.

breakdownSteps.name: Mash out
breakdownSteps.description: Mash out at 168° F (76° C), with pre-boil wort volume of 7 gal. (26.5 L).

breakdownSteps.name: Add hops
breakdownSteps.description: Bring to a rolling boil for 60 minutes, adding hops at specified intervals from end of boil.

breakdownSteps.name: Chill wort
breakdownSteps.description: Chill wort to 65° F (18° C) and pitch yeast.

breakdownSteps.name: Ferment
breakdownSteps.description: Ferment in primary at 65° F (18° C) until fermentation slows significantly (7–9 days).

breakdownSteps.name: Rack to and Dry Hop
breakdownSteps.description: Rack to secondary fermenter and dry hop for no more than 10 days at 68° F (20° C).

breakdownSteps.name: Bottle
breakdownSteps.description: Keg at 2.5 volumes (5 g/L) of CO₂ or bottle condition with 4 oz. (113 g) corn sugar.
